[quest]Tower of Abstraction[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §aMagical Energy Absorber§r

You can use up to 1 Multi-Amp Dynamo Hatch or Laser Source Hatch

Power Generation:

§9Creeper Egg: §c1A HV
§9Dragon Egg: §c1A EV
§9Infinity Egg: §c2A IV§r

[note]You can only have 1 Infinity Egg per segment[/note]

Every §a2§r^N segments gives §c2%§r max efficiency bonus, and every Infinity Egg gives §c1%§r

Every empty space decreases max efficiency by §c5%§r

Warm-up process:

§c.01%§r Base
Each Pair of Dragon Eggs (up to 50 pairs) adds §c.01%§r
Each Infinity Egg (no limit) adds §c1%§r

[warn]DO NOT BREAK ANY PART OF THE MACHINE WHILE IT IS RUNNING[/warn]
